metadata.title: CVE-2021-20228 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine 2.9.18, where sensitive info is notmasked by default and is not protected by the no_log feature when using thesub-option feature of the basic.py module. This flaw allows an attacker toobtain sensitive information. The highest threat from this vulnerability isto confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
